Riot has a zero tolerance policy on racist and derogatory comments, regardless of context. You clearly received at least one report for that game, which means a review would have found your language and punished you for it. Words like that are ALWAYS a bad idea, since even if you're just talking in team chat and an enemy reports you it can flag the game.

The fact that the rest of your chat skewed towards the negative probably also didn't win you any favors.
